features: 【 Ajustable Brightness & 3 Colors Lighting Modes 】- The LED brightness of this hollywood lighted makeup mirror can be changed as you need. This LED makeup mirror provides 3 colors lighting modes so that you can also adjust different brightness to meet your different makeup needs, no matter it is early morning or late night.

【 Detachable 10X Magnifying Mirror 】- Our light up makeup mirror has 10X magnifying mirror to help applying mascara, eyeliner, eyebrow and lipstick, creating flawless and delicate makeup, suitable for the pursuit of exquisite you.This

【Touch-Sensitive Control & Smart Memory Function】 - Simply turn on/off the light up vanity mirror and adjust the brightness by touching the sensor switch on the screen. Button M can adjust the light modes, button P can adjust the brightness. Intelligent light memory function make you easy to use the suitable light adjusted last time,which helps you get the right natural light, to create your most perfect makeup.

【 Portable, Compact & Elegangt Design 】 - Overall frame allows you to get your entire face in view at once. The 9 frosted LED globe bulbs can be used continuously with 50,000 hours life span. It is very durable without changing the bulb.Fitted the rubber pads on the bottom to prevent the mirror from slipping or falling during use.

【 Best Friendship & Birthday & Christmas Gifts 】- Perfect Gift for any Girls/Ladies. You will fall in love with this hollywood vanity makeup mirror at the first sight.We're so confident in the quality of our lighted makeup mirror that we offer Lifetime Exchange or Money Back Warranty Unconditionall. Please feel free to contact us if you have any product problems.
body.description: KOTDNING MAKEUP VANITY MIRROR What is a Hollywood Vanity Mirror? A Hollywood mirror is a lighted vanity mirror that you set in your dressing or vanity area to check your appearance, apply makeup perfectly, and do your hair. This mirror not only helps you to glam up yourself to a T but also enhances the appeal of your vanity area. The main feature of this vanity accessory is that it comes with light bulbs included in it to brighten up your face so that you can see a luminous reflection of your face in the mirror and view every detail for a flawless look. Frame: Tinplate Light: Cool white/ warm white / warm yellow Mirror Size: 25*30cm Bulb: 9*3W LED bulbs

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Perform your makeup routine before this Hollywood style vanity mirror and enjoy a fantastic and healthy life. This makeup mirror has 9 LED light bulbs with adjustable brightness, including warm yellow, daylight and cool white 3 different lights , allowing you to accomplish a flawless makeup even at night. Boasting smart touch control and 360-degree swivel design, this lighted makeup mirror provides superb flexibility and convenience when putting on tricky winged eyeliner or eyebrow line. This Hollywood makeup mirror is durable and large enough to serve as the centerpiece of a desk, dresser or vanity table in your bathroom or bedroom. Look no further than this makeup mirror to lend a touch of luxury to any interior decoration.

How to Operate the Smart Touch Switch? Convert light colo Convert light color- Tap once to switch Daylight/Warm White/Warm Light. Turn on/off- Tap once to turn on/off the mirror. Adjust brightness- Long press to adjust the brightness stepless. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality at a low price!
reviews.reviewText: This mirror has been exactly what I needed for getting ready everyday. The three different lighting tones are perfect depending on which time of day you're using the mirror, and it is a great size without taking up too much space. The little magnifying mirror that comes with it is also such a bonus, and it is super easy to attach/ take off depending on your preference. Similar items I was looking at were between $60-100, and I was a little skeptical since this mirror was so much more affordable. However, I am so glad I decided on taking the chance with this mirror, it is exactly what I was hoping for!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This mirror is perfect size for my vanity area
reviews.reviewText: I love the two options for different lighting. Is exactly what I wanted and even voter than the round mirrors, because you can see your entire face easily. I would definitely purchase this item again. It is also good quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Size & Lighting
reviews.reviewText: Since I recently started a makeup business I needed a good mirror I researched for many weeks. I am very happy with this purchase, good quality material, Lights are perfect and bright really bright I don't have to turn it up all the way that's how bright most mirrors in the past are never bright enough. 10/10 💜

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Excellent makeup mirror! Super easy to use. I love that there is a warm, cool, and natural light setting. And you can brighten and dim the light as needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic — Just what I needed!
reviews.reviewText: Great packaging so don’t worry too much about damages during transit. Exactly what I needed, cute, nice and bright. 😮‍💨❤️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This mirror is great! It is a great size and the lighting is great you can change it to a few different shades or colors and the mirror can bend forward or back! I would totally recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My 16 year old absolutely loves this. Great lighting, perfect size and put together well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Bright Choice for Campus Life - Kotdning Vanity Mirror with Lights Review
reviews.reviewText: As a parent preparing my child for college life, I couldn't be happier with the Kotdning Vanity Mirror with Lights. This mirror isn't just a reflection; it's a brilliant addition to their dorm essentials. The built-in lights provide a well-lit space for both grooming and studying, ensuring they start their day right and stay focused. Its compact design perfectly fits their limited space, and the adjustable angles offer versatility for various tasks. I'm impressed by the sturdy build and sleek look, adding a touch of sophistication to their surroundings. This mirror isn't just a practical tool; it's a thoughtful investment in their comfort and success during their college journey.
